sentences.en: Boston Dynamics's much - admired walking robot has a humanlike gait but relies on external power.
sentences.cn: 波士顿动力公司备受赞誉的步行机器人,走起路来似模似样,不过要靠外置动力行动.

sentences.en: Hmm. Apes that evolve into something humanlike? Pretty unlikely methinks.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 类人猿进化成和人类一样? 我想不太可能.

sentences.en: In terms of career advice, the most obvious message is: Focus on jobs and areas of expertise that appear to require humanlike general intelligence.
sentences.cn: 从职业建议上将，最明显的一点是：关注与那些需要人类总体智能的工作或专业领域。

sentences.en: In the articles in Science, Dr. Berger’s team describes novel combinations of apelike and humanlike features in the hand, foot and pelvis of the new species.
sentences.cn: 在《科学》杂志文章里，伯格尔博士的研究小组描述这个新物种的手，脚和骨盆方面的似类人猿和似人特征的新型组合。

sentences.en: J: Hmm. Apes that evolve into something humanlike? Pretty unlikely methinks.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊: 嗯, 类人猿进化成和人类一样? 我想不太可能.

sentences.en: Recent research has found that mice make humanlike facial expressions when they are in pain.
sentences.cn: 最近的研究发现当老鼠痛苦的时候,它们也表现出痛苦的面部表情.

words.tran_cn: 人文主义的；人道主义的
人道主义者；人类学者，人文学者；人文主义者
人类；人道；仁慈；人文学科
